title: Tokenomics
description: Tokenomics is a token-aware optimization and memory layer that sits between your application and LLM providers, intelligently allocating tokens, learning from past interactions, and reducing unnecessary computational waste.

title: AdVantage Ecosystem
description:
Driving a New Era of Learning with Peer-to-Peer Collaboration and Community Innovation
Advantage Ecosystem is a next-generation educational platform designed to foster decentralized, peer-to-peer learning networks. Our mission is to make education more engaging, inclusive, and practical by creating a dynamic ecosystem where students, professionals, and communities collaborate seamlessly.
